name: DYNOGEMS
description:
Incredibly addictive and easy to play! Kick back and get ready to experience this new jewel in the classic "Match Three" tradition. Make fantastic combinations organizing and regrouping jewels of the same color, setting off multiple explosions and chain reactions, and even clear the screen when you get the right jewel in the right place. You can also use magic items to get more powerful explosions.

Memory Stick Duo™ Compatible: 128 KB
